[Home](./index.md) &gt; [bge-core](./bge-core.md) &gt; [CardContainer](./bge-core.cardcontainer.md)

## CardContainer class

Base class for general card containers, like decks and hands. We don't assume anything about how cards are stored.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class CardContainer<TCard extends Card> extends GameObject implements ICardReceiver<TCard> 
```
**Extends:** [GameObject](./bge-core.gameobject.md)

**Implements:** [ICardReceiver](./bge-core.icardreceiver.md)<!-- -->&lt;TCard&gt;

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(CardType)](./bge-core.cardcontainer._constructor_.md) |  | Base class for general card containers, like decks and hands. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cardDimensions](./bge-core.cardcontainer.carddimensions.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [ICardDimensions](./bge-core.icarddimensions.md) | Gets the dimensions of the card type stored in this container. |
|  [count](./bge-core.cardcontainer.count.md) | <p><code>abstract</code></p><p><code>readonly</code></p> | number | Gets the number of cards in this container. |
|  [isEmpty](./bge-core.cardcontainer.isempty.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | If true, this container has no cards. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(card)](./bge-core.cardcontainer.add.md) |  | Add a single card to the default place in this container. |
|  [addRange(cards)](./bge-core.cardcontainer.addrange.md) |  | Add a whole wad of cards to the default place in this container. |
|  [onAdd(card)](./bge-core.cardcontainer.onadd.md) | <p><code>protected</code></p><p><code>abstract</code></p> | Called when a card is to be added to this container. |
|  [onRemove(card)](./bge-core.cardcontainer.onremove.md) | <p><code>protected</code></p><p><code>abstract</code></p> | Called when a card is to be removed from this container. |
|  [onRemoveAll(predicate)](./bge-core.cardcontainer.onremoveall.md) | <p><code>protected</code></p><p><code>abstract</code></p> | Called when cards matching a predicate are to be removed. |
|  [remove(card)](./bge-core.cardcontainer.remove.md) |  | Remove a specific card from this container. The given card must actually be inside this container. |
|  [removeAll()](./bge-core.cardcontainer.removeall.md) |  | Remove all cards from this container. |
|  [removeAll(cards)](./bge-core.cardcontainer.removeall_1.md) |  | Remove the given cards from this container. |
|  [removeAll(predicate)](./bge-core.cardcontainer.removeall_2.md) |  | Remove all cards matching a predicate from this container. |
